snippet.title: Yakuza 4: Official Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
The seedy Japanese crime game Yakuza 4 is finally here. Are you ready for some bike throwing, thug fighting underworld action?

IGN's YouTube is just a taste of our content. Get more:
http://www.ign.com

Want this week's top videos? Sign up:
http://go.ign.com/VideoRound-up
